Troubleshooting overview

To help troubleshoot issues with your installation, see the troubleshooting topics in this section.

In addition, you can check the health information for your environment as described in monitoring deployment health and monitoring Kafka cluster health.

If you need help, want to raise questions, or have feature requests, see the Event Streams support channels.
